text: Ni$ illa i kunwi umedya ucbiê di Ibôahim akked wid illan yides, mi nnan i ugdud nnsen: "nemgirred ikwen, kunwi akked wayen teppanzem, war Öebbi. Nenkeô ikwen. Taâdawt akked dd$el, ersen d garane$, i lebda, alamma tumnem s Öebbi Yiwen". Kkes ed awalen i inna Ibôahim, i baba s: "ad velbe$ a ppeppusemmêev, xas ur iyi Ikellef Öebbi, fellak, s wacemma". A Mass nne$! Ppkal nne$ fellaK; nutub iK; $uôeK tu$alin
